body_html: Hi @F3PiX ! I am sorry I took so long to reply. I am currently working on another project for RGSoC'17 and I would love to solve this issue. it kinda was on the back of my head, but I never got around to working on it :( If you want to, do go ahead, else just notify me and I will make it a point to resolve it :')
